reviews.customers_say: Customers love the Christmas sweater's beautiful red color, with one noting the shimmer on the sleeves, and appreciate its good quality, softness, and thickness. Customers find it comfortable, with one mentioning there's no itchy sparkles getting to the skin, and consider it fun to wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful holiday sweater!
items.body: Fabulous top! The sweater material is very well made. It is very soft. I got a large and it fits very nicely. The sleeves are extremely comfortable as they are smooth on the inside. The sweater body is thicker sweater but not overly heavy. Steamed out very easily. Read more
items.author: Melissa Miller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas sweater with shimmer
items.body: Gifted this to a Christmas lover. They LOVED it so much. It was so nice and the size was true to size. It was soft , the color was very beautiful red and it was comfortable. Recommended ðŸ¤© Read more
items.author: Ana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Warm Sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! It is a thick material and the shimmer on the sleeves is super fun! It is true to size but not form fitting. Very warm and comfortable for an all day wear. I have not washed it yet but plan on washing in a net bag on gentle cycle. UPDATE: I washed it on delicate cycle in a bag and hung to dry. I used a steamer for the wrinkles with no issues. Read more
items.author: Emily Capone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the holidays !
items.body: Soooo cute !!! Pretty sweater . Not bulky or itchy . Canâ€™t wait to wear to my friends holiday party . Just the right thickness but not overly thick sweater . Can dress up or dress down . So happy with my purchase ! Read more
items.author: Joezwyf

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Runs a little small. Super soft and great quality though. Read more
items.author: nsa804

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Christmas sweater!
items.body: This is such a fun sweater! It is soft (the arms are lined, so they're soft even with the sparkles on the outside), warm, and pretty. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!!
items.body: What a cute sweater!!! I bought an XL because Iâ€™m a bit chubby. It fit well, but I wish it was about 3 inches longer. I have a long torso, so it was just a bit too short. I had to wear a tank top under it which looked fine. Other than that, this is a really pretty sweater. Itâ€™s thick, but not itchy or rough. The arms shimmered in the light. I would love to get the black one as itâ€™s more my style, but the red is very pretty. I definitely recommend this if you want something fun for the holidays. Read more
items.author: Linda H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas sequin sweater
items.body: So beautiful!!!. Feels great on. True to size. Wonderful fabric. Got lots of compliments Read more
items.author: Brenda

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black-jolly, Green-merry, Black, Love-pink, Red-santa, Red-merry, Pink-merry, Red, Be Mine-red, Beige, Be Mine-black, Love-red, Valentine-pink, Valentine-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
